name:
Customization
Custom Branding - Can change name and desc with custom branding set to false

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Ensure `Enable Custom Branding` is set to `false`
  1. Change Site Name to "Mattermost_Test" (or just add "-test" at the end)
  2. Enter some text in the `Site Description` field, and Save
  3. Log out (or view login page in a separate browser)
inline.expectedResult:
• Sign-in page should read "[Team Name] on Mattermost_Test"
  • And the description text you entered should appear

Related bug: Blank Custom Branding Site Name causes odd-looking blanks in UI and notification emails â€” MM-13694
